participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and nurturing, enjoys connecting with others and sharing experiences.
participant_1.background: My spouse works in the medical field, which allows me to enjoy my kittens and weekend adventures. I enjoy entertaining my former students and catching up on their lives. I have a soft spot for poodles, so I would love to have a plush poodle in my nursery. I have been to Mardi Gras in New Orleans, and it was an amazing experience. I am glad that my wife's cancer is in remission and that she is able to enjoy the outdoors with me.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and playful, loves to engage in hobbies and enjoys a cozy atmosphere.
participant_2.background: I love to play video games in the comfort of my home on a rainy day. Penn and Teller are my favorite magicians. I work as a construction worker during the summers. I miss my parents' home, but I needed a change of scenery. Yellow is my favorite color.

content.text: Hey! How is your day going?
It's going well, thanks! How about yours?
It's good! I'm just hanging out and playing video games.
I'm playing a new game called Star Wars: Jedi Fallen Order. It's a lot of fun!
Oh cool! I've heard good things about that game.
Yeah, it's really good! I'm having a lot of fun with it.
What other games do you like to play?
I like playing a lot of different games. I like action games, adventure games, and RPGs.
Me too! I love playing action games and RPGs.
My favorite games are The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt, and Horizon Zero Dawn.
Those are all great games! I've played all of them and they're all so much fun.
Yeah, they're all really good games. I'm glad we have similar taste in games.
Me too! It's always fun to find someone who likes the same games you do.
